channel.title: STA304 Problem Set
channel.description: Recent content on STA304 Problem Set

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: The relationship between educational levels and total household incomes in Canada
item.description: Code and data supporting this analysis is available at: https://github.com/1998-niejingyi/STA304 We use (R Core Team 2020) and R package and (Wickham et al. 2019) to do the analysis. Abstract In this study, we used the 2019 CES data to explore the relationship between the educational level and the total household income in Canada. The result demonstrates people with the higher educational level in Canada tend to have more total household incomes.
